coreAttributes.name: Porcine Pop
coreAttributes.description: A small glass bottle filled with a dark brown liquid. The list of ingredients on the back of the bottle's label reveals this to be a sort of cola, albeit one with an extraordinarily high sugar content.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first popping off the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the glass bottle of Porcine Pop up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. Tilting [npc.her] head back, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] drinking the cool, fizzy cola, and despite its overwhelmingly sweet taste, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to quickly finish the entire bottle.
useDescriptions.otherUse: After first popping off the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the glass bottle of Porcine Pop up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. Tilting [npc2.her] head back, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] drinking the cool, fizzy cola, and despite its overwhelmingly sweet taste, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(manage)] to quickly finish the entire bottle.
